common.description: Build, backtest, and optimize your quantitative trading strategies without coding, using intuitive "if...then..." rules. Let data drive your investment decisions.

dashboard.continueOptimizing: Continue optimizing your investment strategies, or explore innovative ideas in the community

intro.title: Reject gut feelings, speak with data
intro.desc: Transform your 'bottom-picking intuition' into verifiable investment strategies. No coding required, complete 10-year historical backtests in seconds using global edge networks.

triggers.title: Simple building blocks, complex logic assembly
triggers.desc: Built-in 50+ technical indicators including RSI, MACD, moving averages. Support 'AND/OR' multi-logic nesting. Whether simple dollar-cost averaging or complex grid trading, implement like building blocks.

builder.title: No code needed, just fill in blanks
builder.desc: No programming knowledge needed. Natural language interaction: 'If drops 15%, buy $1000'. WYSIWYG, strategy configuration never more intuitive.

backtest.title: Ten years of market data, verified in seconds
backtest.desc: Millisecond computation based on Cloudflare's global edge network. Reject long waits, get instant data feedback for your inspiration.

analytics.title: A picture is worth a thousand words, review every decision
analytics.desc: Compare NAV curves, mark buy/sell points, visualize max drawdown. See not just how much you earned, but how you earned it, distinguish luck from skill.

risk.title: Advance to attack, retreat to defend
risk.desc: Built-in cooldown mechanism and dynamic position management. Prevent burning through bullets too early during downturns, find the optimal risk-reward balance.

backtest.description: Generate real-time NAV curves with professional metrics like Sharpe ratio and max drawdown to intuitively evaluate strategy performance.

engine.description: Support multiple technical indicators (RSI, MA) and price action triggers, freely combining buy/sell logic.

cloud.description: High-performance edge computing architecture based on Cloudflare Workers, millisecond response, accessible anytime, anywhere.

voo.description: Largest and cheapest 'US Top 500' one-stop package

vti.description: One fund = entire US stock market (large+mid+small 3500 stocks)

schd.description: High dividend + quality screening, retail investors' 'favorite for dividend income'

ixus.description: One-click setup for 'global stocks outside US'

navbar.contactAuthorDescription: Reach out for feedback or questions.

header.notificationsTooltip: When enabled, checks signals after market close daily and sends email if triggered

executionGuide.title: Execution Guide
executionGuide.executionTiming: Trades will be executed at market open the next trading day after signal triggers.
executionGuide.conditionActionPair: Ensure at least one condition and action pair exists.
executionGuide.confirmParameters: Confirm that time range, capital, and symbol are set correctly.
executionGuide.reuseStrategy: After saving, the strategy can be reused in community or personal space.
executionGuide.backtestResultsAvailable: Backtest results are available, you can re-run to refresh performance.

triggerList.title: Trigger Panel
triggerList.description: View trigger sequence and quickly adjust conditions, actions, and cooldown.

status.backtestingDescription: Strategy backtesting is running, check latest results later.
status.waitingForConfigDescription: Add at least one trigger to save and run backtesting.
status.readyDescription: Configuration complete, current strategy can run backtesting directly.

conditions.drawdownFromPeak: Price drops more than {percentage}% from {days}-day high
conditions.periodReturn: Price has {direction} more than {percentage}% in the past {days} days

messages.noTriggersYet: No triggers created yet, click the button below to get started.
messages.noPublicTriggers: This strategy has no public trigger configuration yet.
messages.pleaseFillStrategyName: Please fill in the strategy name
messages.deleteFailed: Delete failed, please try again later
messages.deleteStrategyDescription: Delete operation is irreversible, can only delete strategies created by yourself. After confirmation, the strategy and its backtesting records will be cleared.

community.title: Strategy Community
community.manageOptimize: Manage and optimize your investment strategies
community.commentDesc: View and post comments about this strategy.

saveStrategyDialog.title: Save Strategy
saveStrategyDialog.description: Name your strategy so you can view and load it later.
saveStrategyDialog.publicDescription: Allows other users to view and copy your strategy
saveStrategyDialog.privateDescription: Strategy will remain private, only you can access it

resultsReportDialog.title: Backtest Report
resultsReportDialog.description: View the historical backtest performance, return comparisons, and detailed trading data of the strategy.
resultsReportDialog.runBacktest: Run a backtest to view results
resultsReportDialog.dataError: Data format error: Unable to parse performance metrics

setupWizard.title: Strategy Setup Wizard
setupWizard.pleaseEnterETF: Please enter the ETF code and date range you want to backtest.
setupWizard.strategyDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your investment strategy philosophy and goals...

validation.endBeforeStart: End date must be after start date
validation.minRange: Backtest range must be at least {days} days
validation.strategyNameTooLong: Strategy name is too long (max 10 Chinese characters or 20 English letters)

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

triggerActionForm.description: Determine how the system places orders

hints.cashPercent: Use a percentage of the account's current available cash for orders
hints.positionPercent: Sell a certain percentage of the current position
hints.totalValuePercent: Adjust the position to a specified percentage of the account's total assets
hints.default: Enter the amount or percentage for this transaction

triggerConditionForm.description: Choose the market conditions you want to capture

drawdownFromPeak.label: Drawdown from Peak
drawdownFromPeak.description: Price has significantly pulled back from historical high

newLow.label: New Low (Breakdown)
newLow.description: Breaks below the lowest point in the past N days

priceStreak_down.label: Consecutive Declines (Bearish)
priceStreak_down.description: Multiple consecutive days of closing lower

newHigh.label: New High (Breakout)
newHigh.description: Breaks above the highest price in the past N days

priceStreak_up.label: Consecutive Gains (Bullish)
priceStreak_up.description: Multiple consecutive days of closing higher

vix.label: VIX Fear Index (Threshold)
vix.description: VIX is above or below a value

vix_streak.label: VIX Streak
vix_streak.description: VIX moves in same direction for N days

vix_breakout.label: VIX Breakout
vix_breakout.description: VIX makes N-day high or low

drawdownFromPeak.prefix: When the price falls more than
drawdownFromPeak.middle: % from the highest point in the past

newHigh.prefix: When the price breaks above the highest price in the past

newLow.prefix: When the price breaks below the lowest price in the past

condition.title: If (IF)...
condition.description: Choose the market conditions you want to capture

action.title: Then (THEN)...
action.description: Determine how the system places orders

cooldown.title: And (AND)...Cooldown
cooldown.description: Set a cooling period to avoid repeated triggers

cooldown.title: And (AND)...Cooldown Period
cooldown.description: Cooling period prevents repeated trades. The system will check trigger conditions again after the cooldown ends.

conditions.drawdownFromPeak: When the price falls more than {percentage}% from the highest point in the past {days} days
conditions.newLow: When the price breaks below the lowest point in the past {days} days
conditions.newHigh: When the price breaks above the highest point in the past {days} days
conditions.priceStreak: When the price closes {direction} for {count} consecutive {unit}
conditions.periodReturn: When the price has {direction} more than {percentage}% in the past {days} days
conditions.maCross: When the price {direction} the {period}-day moving average
conditions.vix_streak: When VIX closes {direction} for {count} consecutive days

cooldown.enabled: Then do not execute again for {days} days

performanceMetrics.benchmarkDescription: Buy and hold from the beginning
performanceMetrics.dcaDescription: Fixed amount buy on first trading day of each week

status.400: Invalid request, please check your input.
status.401: Please log in again to continue.
status.403: You do not have permission to perform this action.
status.404: Target resource not found, please try again later.
status.408: Request timed out, please try again later.
status.409: Request conflict, please refresh and try again.
status.429: Too many requests, please try again later.
status.500: Server is having issues, please try again later.
status.502: Gateway or proxy error, please try again later.
status.504: Gateway timeout, please try again later.

api.timeout: Request timed out, please check your network or try again later.
api.networkError: Network error, please check your connection and try again.
api.requestFailed: Request failed, please try again later.
